title: Every few months Riot overbuffs an otherwise balanced champion just because nobody plays them.
body: Seriously, what reason was there to even fuck with Morgana? Morg players weren't complaining, complaints about playing against her pale in comparison to others, and her winrate wasn't particularly low or high. Why not just leave her alone and focus on the billions of other blatantly more problematic champions? Morgana should've been a low priority. Now I'm worried that she's eventually going to be nerfed into an even WORSE state than she was before the buffs.

This is actually been a design flaw with Riot for quite some time, quite frankly since the major reworks started.  The new kits they're making are so fundamentally overloaded they are either S tier busted or numerically nerfed into oblivion.
The issue was that Riot didn't focus on the annoying parts of her kit like W and the E range/hit box.
The change was meant to help Morg return to Mid Lane, instead of being stuck as a glorified Mage-support. It isn't random, they've been trying to do that with Zyra and Brand too.
She wasn't god tier, but she was still a mid-tier mid laner at the very least.

Yeah, but she had zero incentive to go mid, when Bot is so much easier for her and a partner. When she was popular mid, she became a stall fest of clearing waves. (I have a fond memory of a Morg vs Malz lane two seasons ago. By the time laning was done, we were both 0/0/0, and 200 CS up) 

The changes were meant to encourage actually fighting your laner, instead of just "Throw Pool on Waves", as I've seen plenty of times in the past before.

Welcome to F2P.
